content: lion brand pattern # cja-wbaf skill level intermediate level 3 jamie® pompadour article #890 *discontinued* *sport weight yarn can be substituted * 2 colors a white 2352 yards b pastel pink 1960 yards crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm throw is worked in panels that are then slip stitched together work with 2 strands of yarn held together throughout panel a is worked in color a panel b is worked in color b pattern features popcorn diamonds assemble panels as shown in diagram finish with picot edging and fringe
